author: Special Correspondent
text: The Chennai-based Tamil Nadu Gastroenterologist Trust will conduct a free medical camp in Kallipatti, Gobi taluk on January 9 from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. at Maragatham Ramasamy marriage hall. The camp will offer free advice for complications such as heartburns, constipation and indigestion. The camp will be conducted by a team of doctors from Apollo Hospitals led by K.R. Palaniswamy, senior consultant, besides L. Venkatakrishnan of PSG Hospital and T.A.Balakumaran from Erode. For further details contact: 9443305217; 9750035962; or 9597859683.
title: Free medical camp
